text:
[Verse]
In a dream so far away
Stars above begin to play
Dancing lights they pave the way
Night to day we float and sway

[Verse 2]
Through the mist we chase the night
Moonlight glow it feels so right
Wishes whispered take their flight
Hold on tight to love's delight

[Chorus]
Starlit dreams we can't deny
Underneath the endless sky
Fantasies make spirits high
Together we will fly

[Verse 3]
Whispers in the twilight air
Magic moments we will share
Silent nights without a care
In your eyes I see a flare

[Chorus]
Starlit dreams we can't deny
Underneath the endless sky
Fantasies make spirits high
Together we will fly

[Verse 4]
Journey to the night again
Skipping through the starry glen
Hand in hand we now ascend
Glorious our hearts will mend
title: Starlit Fantasy
